hero.title: Minoh Falls & Katsuoji Temple Bike Tours
hero.subtitle: Experience the beauty of Osaka's hidden gem - just 20 minutes from Osaka-Umeda

waterfall.title: Beautiful Waterfall & Majestic Temple
waterfall.description: Visit the stunning {minohFallsLink} and the historic {katsuojiLink}, where tradition meets natural beauty. Experience the spiritual atmosphere among thousands of daruma dolls and enjoy breathtaking mountain views.

cultural.title: Cultural & Historical Experience
cultural.description: Immerse yourself in Japanese culture and history as you explore ancient temples and shrines. Learn about local traditions and the significance of these sacred places while enjoying the peaceful mountain setting.

ebike.title: Active Fun Without the Strain
ebike.description: Enjoy an active adventure on premium e-bikes that take the strain out of the hills. Experience the thrill of cycling through mountain roads while the electric assist makes it effortless.

efficiency.title: Half Day Tour - Amazing Efficiency
efficiency.description: Experience the best of Minoh in just half a day without feeling rushed. Our carefully planned route maximizes your time, letting you see waterfalls, temples, and stunning mountain scenery in one perfect adventure.

accessibility.title: Easily Accessible from Osaka
accessibility.description: Our tour starts and finishes 5 minutes on foot from Sakurai Station - just 20 minutes by train from Osaka-Umeda. This makes it a great way to escape the city and find yourself in nature faster than you thought possible.

bikes.title: High-Quality E-Bikes & More
bikes.description: Choose from our selection of premium electric bikes and traditional road bikes, all perfectly maintained and suited for mountain terrain. With professional fitting and safety briefing, you'll be comfortable and confident on every ride.

cta.title: Ready for Your Adventure?
cta.description: Book your Minoh Falls & Katsuoji bike tour today

comingSoon.title: Coming Soon
comingSoon.bikes: We're preparing detailed information about our bikes and rental options. In the meantime, please refer to our {viatorLink} for details.
comingSoon.about: In the meantime, you can learn more about our tours on our {viatorLink}.

tourDetails.title: Tour Details
tourDetails.subtitle: Experience the mountain roads of Minoh by e-bike and visit both Minoh Falls and Katsuoji, the temple of winning
tourDetails.description: High quality electric-assist bikes for a range of heights and helmets are provided.

orientation.title: Orientation
orientation.description: A short safety briefing, in which I will explain how to operate the e-bikes and ensure everyone's bikes and helmets are adjusted correctly.

rideToFalls.title: Ride up to Minoh Falls
rideToFalls.description: Ride alongside the Hankyu railway line to Minoh Station (2.7km), before entering the forested mountain road and climbing to the waterfall.

enjoyFalls.title: Take in Minoh Falls
enjoyFalls.description: Enjoy a well-earned rest and take in the beauty of the waterfall.

continueToTemple.title: Continue on to Katsuoji
continueToTemple.description: Ascend deeper into the mountain and complete the climb to Katsuoji temple (3.2km).

experienceTemple.title: Experience Katsuoji
experienceTemple.description: Make a leisurely circuit of the temple of winning, Katsuoji. Learn about Japanese Buddhism and take in stunning views of Osaka.

returnToSakurai.title: Return to Sakurai
returnToSakurai.description: Reap the reward of the uphill journey and enjoy the scenery as we descend back to Minoh and return to Sakurai.

items.waterNote: A 600ml bottle is provided per bike, but you'll need more in summer
items.backpack: A backpack to hold your things
items.moneyNote: entrance to Katsuoji is included, but you may want extra snacks or souvenirs
